description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à New Orleans, United States. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: New Orleans Heritage Glamour near French Quarter & Bourbon Street with Daily Breakfast
hotels.description: Formerly the Omni Riverfront New Orleans, this hotel has undergone an exciting transformation to emerge as the proudly independent The Riverfront Hotel New Orleans. Positioned just a short stroll from the Mississippi River, this charming escape places you at the heart of New Orleans’ soulful spirit. Nestled in the historic Warehouse District, you're moments from the French Quarter - where jazz clubs pulse and Bourbon Street beckons with its legendary energy. After a day soaking in the city’s magic, return to Fulton St. Bistro & Bar for a Parisian-style setting with a modern take on bold Louisiana flavours. Sip a classic Sazerac, wander down Royal Street and let the iron-laced balconies, vibrant galleries and roaming brass bands guide your next adventure. As night falls, meander through Fulton Alley - home to boutique bowling lanes, cozy outdoor patios and the kind of eclectic nightlife only locals know best.

hotels.vendor_name: Hotel Indigo New Orleans French Quarter
hotels.title: Stylish New Orleans Stay in French Quarter with Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Find your feet in New Orleans with a stay at Hotel Indigo New Orleans - French Quarter, an IHG Hotel. Inspired by the colour, culture and costuming of this vibrant city, this chic hotel unites style and comfort, with an enviable location in the heart of the French Quarter. Just a stone's throw from historic Bourbon Street, enjoy easy access to some of the city's best sights, before returning to the hotel to feast on soulful Cajun cuisine at Common Interest.

hotels.vendor_name: Crowne Plaza New Orleans French Quarter
hotels.title: Central New Orleans Escape With Rooftop Pool, Steps Away From Bourbon Street
hotels.description: Embrace the vibrant spirit of the Big Easy with a stay at Crowne Plaza New Orleans French Quarter - Astor, an IHG Hotel. Perfectly positioned on the edge of the historic French Quarter, you're steps away from the pulsating energy of Bourbon Street, the gastronomic delights of Royal Street, and the iconic Jackson Square. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's outdoor pool or enjoy Creole-inspired cuisine at the onsite restaurant, Bourbon House. An embodiment of the true spirit of New Orleans, the hotel offers world-class amenities, proximity to the happening places, and the best of the best hospitality.

hotels.title: Boutique New Orleans Escape near Iconic French Quarter
hotels.description: Embrace New Orleans' energy from International House - a boutique hotel positioned on the fringes of the vibrant French Quarter. Authentic, timeless and with a splash of retro flair, this NOLA oasis offers everything you need for an unforgettable Southern escape. Unwind with a homegrown blood-orange cocktail in the luxe Loa lobby bar, refresh with lemon water from the 24-hour lobby service or admire eclectic art in the second-floor gallery, which houses the USA's largest Banksy mural.

hotels.title: Historic 1920s New Orleans Escape Moments from the French Quarter
hotels.description: Restored to its exquisite 1920s grandeur, Nopsi Hotel, New Orleans will transport you to the glamorous roaring twenties from the moment you're escorted inside by the charming doorman. While this hotel has now been declared a historic landmark, it offers unparalleled modern facilities, including a rooftop swimming pool framed by cabanas, a sophisticated 'Above the Grid' rooftop bar and an incredible restaurant serving up handmade pizzas and classic Gulf Coast seafood. When you're not living a life of luxury within the confines of this heritage masterpiece, the delights of Bourbon Street are at your doorstep, while the Warehouse/Arts Districts are easily walkable. The French Quarter beckons a mere three blocks away, where you'll discover a reimagined French Market, modern boutiques and artisan cocktail bars in between antique stores and thriving restaurants.

hotels.title: New Orleans French Quarter Glamour Moments from Bourbon Street with Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Embrace New Orleans' charm and southern hospitality at this elegant hotel, ideally positioned in the heart of the vibrant French Quarter. Authentic, timeless and with a splash of modern flair, this oasis offers everything you need for an unforgettable escape. Savour the local flavours at the Rib Room restaurant, refresh with a cocktail at Touche Bar or ascend to the rooftop pool, offering panoramic views of the Mississippi River. When you're ready to explore, stroll along the riverfront or take the 10-minute stroll to lively Bourbon Street, where the scent of Cajun fare wafts along pavements packed with lively jazz clubs and cocktail bars.

hotels.title: New Orleans French Quarter Glamour Along Bourbon Street with Onsite Jazz Club
hotels.description: Located on the world-famous Bourbon Street in New Orleans is the Royal Sonesta New Orleans, a landmark hotel built in 1969. Here, time comes to a halt and old-world French Quarter elegance takes over. The hotel is located just steps from the city's best restaurants, bars and entertainment venues, so you'll never run out of things to do. Wrought iron balconies look out over vibrant New Orleans streets (selected rooms only), while inside incredible facilities including five restaurants and bars will undoubtedly keep nights fun-filled. Catch a live jazz performance with a cocktail in hand onsite at The Jazz Playhouse, experience world-class cuisine at Restaurant R'evolution and enjoy a tipple or two at Le Booze.

hotels.title: Culturally Rich Escape in New Orleans near Iconic French Quarter
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the intoxicating rhythm of New Orleans with a stay at InterContinental New Orleans, an IHG Hotel. Nestled on the historic St. Charles Avenue, this hotel offers a gateway to the vibrant French Quarter and the picturesque Garden District. Indulge in the tantalising flavours of Creole cuisine at onsite Trenasse restaurant, sip on classic cocktails at Pete's or soak up cityscape views from the rooftop pool. Venture beyond the hotel to discover the lively Bourbon Street, the historic Jackson Square and the bustling French Market
